snippet: The United Arab Emirates returned to combat missions against the Islamic State for the first time since December, and Jordan separately continued its escalation of strikes against Sunni militants.
abstract: United Arab Emirates return to combat missions against Islamic State for first time since December, launching series of airstrikes in Syria; Jordan also steps up its raids.

byline.original: By HELENE COOPER and ANNE BARNARD
byline.contributor: Helene Cooper reported from Washington, and Anne Barnard from Beirut, Lebanon. Rana F. Sweis contributed reporting from Amman, Jordan.

lead_paragraph: The United Arab Emirates returned to combat missions against the Islamic State for the first time since December, and Jordan separately continued its escalation of strikes against Sunni militants.

headline.main: Jordan and Emirates Carry Out Airstrikes in Syria Against ISIS
headline.print_headline: Jordan and Emirates Carry Out Airstrikes in Syria Against Islamic State

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
